mapper.select: SELECT r.no,r.managerid,s.stadium,s.region, s.location, sp.sportname,r.gametime,r.curr_people,r.max_people,r.payment,r.managerfee,r.g_status FROM rank_game r INNER join stadium_info s on r.st_no = s.st_no INNER join sport sp on r.s_no = sp.s_no WHERE r.gametime-16 < sysdate and sysdate < r.gametime-9 AND r.managerid is null ORDER BY r.gametime

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, t.* FROM ( SELECT r.no, r.managerid, s.stadium, s.region, s.location, sp.sportname, r.gametime, r.curr_people, r.max_people, r.payment, r.managerfee, r.g_status FROM rank_game r INNER JOIN stadium_info s ON r.st_no = s.st_no INNER JOIN sport sp ON r.s_no = sp.s_no WHERE r.gametime - 16 < sysdate AND sysdate < r.gametime - 9 AND r.managerid IS NULL ORDER BY r.gametime ) t WHERE rownum <= ${pageNum * amount} ) WHERE rnum > ${(pageNum - 1) * amount }

SELECT count(*) FROM rank_game r INNER JOIN stadium_info s ON r.st_no = s.st_no INNER JOIN sport sp ON r.s_no = sp.s_no WHERE r.gametime-16 < sysdate AND sysdate < r.gametime-9 AND r.managerid IS NULL
